ddf.catalog.data

Interface Metacard

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DeletedMetacard, MetacardVersion
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptedMetacard, DeletedMetacardImpl, HandlebarsMetacard, IdAndUriMetacard, MetacardImpl, MetacardVersionImpl, QueryMetacardImpl, WorkspaceMetacardImpl

    public interface Metacard
extends Serializable
    A Metacard is a container for Metadata.

    It is modeled after the OGC SimpleFeature and does two additional things:

    1. Represents a resource.
    2. Contains or can be represented as XML metadata.
    This interface does not extend the OGC SimpleFeature interface due to added complexity that was deemed to conflict with the goal of simplicity for this API.
    The Metacard can include key/value-style Attributes, and includes several standard properties: id, title, document, location, source name, dates(created, modified, effective, expiration), and thumbnail.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ANY_DATE
      Attribute name for querying all dates of all temporal properties of a Metacard.
      static String ANY_GEO
      Attribute name for querying all geometries of all geometric properties of a Metacard Used in Queries only
      static String ANY_TEXT
      Attribute name for querying all text of all textual properties of a Metacard.
      static String CHECKSUM
      Attribute checksum value for the RESOURCE_URI
      static String CHECKSUM_ALGORITHM
      Attribute algorithm used to calculate the checksum on the RESOURCE_URI for local resources
      static String CONTENT_TYPE
      Attribute name for querying the metadata content type of a Metacard.
      static String CONTENT_TYPE_VERSION
      Attribute name for querying the version of the metadata content type of a Metacard.
      static String CREATED
      Attribute name for accessing the date/time this Metacard was created.
      static String DEFAULT_TAG
      The default tag type for all metacards
      static String DERIVED
      Attribute name for derived Metacard ids.
      static String DERIVED_RESOURCE_DOWNLOAD_URL
      Attribute name for accessing the derived resource download URL for the derived products of this Metacard.
      static String DERIVED_RESOURCE_URI
      Attribute that provides URIs for derived formats of the Metacard.RESOURCE_URI
      static String DESCRIPTION
      Attribute description associated with the Metacard
      static String EFFECTIVE
      Attribute name for accessing the date/time the Metacard was last known to be up-to-date.

      Attribute name for accessing the date/time the Metacard is no longer valid and could be removed.

      Attribute name for accessing the location for this Metacard.

      Attribute name for accessing the date/time this Metacard was last modified.

      Attribute name for accessing the point of contact to the product this Metacard represents.
      static String RELATED
      Attribute name for related Metacard ids.
      static String RESOURCE_DOWNLOAD_URL
      Attribute name for accessing the resource download URL for the product this Metacard represents.

      Attribute name for accessing the size (in bytes) of the product this Metacard represents.

      Attribute name for accessing the URI reference to the product this Metacard represents.

      Attribute name for accessing the security relevant markings on the product that this Metacard represents.

      Attribute name for querying the target namespace of the metadata content type of a Metacard.
      static String THUMBNAIL
      Attribute name for accessing the thumbnail image of the product this Metacard represents.
      static String TITLE
      Attribute name for accessing the title of the Metacard.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        Attribute getAttribute(String name)
        Returns Attribute for given attribute name.
        Parameters:
        name - name of attribute
        Returns:
        Attribute for given name, or null if not available

      • setAttribute

        void setAttribute(Attribute attribute)
        Sets Attribute with new attribute.
        Parameters:
        attribute - new Attribute to set. If the getValue() call on the passed in attribute returns null, the attribute will be removed from this Metacard.

      • getMetacardType

        MetacardType getMetacardType()
        Return the MetacardType of this Metacard.
        Returns:
        MetacardType - the type of this Metacard, MetacardType is required and must not be null

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns the ID of this Metacard.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(ID)
        Returns:
        unique identifier of the Metacard
        See Also:
        ID

      • getTags

        default Set<String> getTags()
        Returns the tags associated with this metacard.
        Returns:
        Returns the TAGS attribute values if it exists otherwise return null

      • getMetadata

        String getMetadata()
        Returns the metadata associated with this Metacard.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(METADATA)
        Returns:
        XML metadata
        See Also:
        METADATA

        Date getExpirationDate()
        Returns the date/time this Metacard is no longer valid and could be removed.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(EXPIRATION)
        Returns:
        Date - when this Metacard expires and should be removed from any stores.
        See Also:
        EXPIRATION

      • getEffectiveDate

        Returns the date/time this Metacard was last known to be valid.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(EFFECTIVE)
        Returns:
        Date - when the information represented by this Metacard was last known to be valid.
        See Also:
        EFFECTIVE

        String getLocation()
        Returns the WKT representation of the geometry.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(GEOGRAPHY)
        Returns:
        String - WKT-defined geospatial object, returns null if not applicable
        See Also:
        GEOGRAPHY

      • getResourceURI

        URI getResourceURI()
        Get the value of this Metacards Resource URI and in the form of a URI Object.
        Convenience method for new URI(getAttribute(RESOURCE_URI));
        Returns:
        URI - a URI representation of the Metacard's Resource URI which itself is stored as a String ddf.catalog.data.AttributeType.AttributeFormat

      • getResourceSize

        String getResourceSize()
        This is the size of the resource which may or may not contain a unit.
        Returns:
        String - String representation of the size

      • getThumbnail

        byte[] getThumbnail()
        Returns the thumbnail associated with this Metacard.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(THUMBNAIL)
        Returns:
        thumbnail for the Metacard
        See Also:
        THUMBNAIL

      • getContentTypeName

        String getContentTypeName()
        Returns the name of the content type of the Metacard.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(CONTENT_TYPE)
        Returns:
        name of content type of the Metacard
        See Also:
        CONTENT_TYPE

      • getContentTypeVersion

        String getContentTypeVersion()
        Returns the version of the content type of the Metacard.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(CONTENT_TYPE_VERSION)
        Returns:
        version of content type of the Metacard
        See Also:
        CONTENT_TYPE_VERSION

      • getContentTypeNamespace

        URI getContentTypeNamespace()
        Some types of metadata use different content types. If utilized, returns the URI of the content type.
        Convenience method for getAttribute(TARGET_NAMESPACE)
        Returns:
        URI - the sub-type, null if unused
        See Also:
        TARGET_NAMESPACE
